attributes.action: ask the BBC to bring back Moira Stuart as a regular news reader.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC has too many 'dolly bird' news readers. They have pouting over-glossed lips, hair falling in their eyes, and can barely enunciate the Queen's English. Moira can read the news properly without looking like a tart.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
